definition: full of high spirits : joyous, given to conviviality : jovial
examples: think no more, lad; laugh, be jolly

definition: expressing, suggesting, or inspiring lively happiness and good cheer : cheerful

examples: would … do as they were jolly well told
get their jollies by reenacting famous murders
jollied and joked with sailors in the street

definition: to put or try to put in good humor especially to gain an end
examples: try to pay for their entertainment by jollying us along
